ai-tha-ap335:0.3_0: The Elder Nāgas, having a lotus flower
ai-tha-ap335:1.3_0: Seeing the Teacher, supreme in the world,
ai-tha-ap335:2.3_0: and built a monument for him.
ai-tha-ap335:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap335:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap335:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap335:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pukkusāti.
ai-tha-ap335:7.1_0: In the third time the Elder Nun Pippalavaṇṇā,
